text: Fausto Feliciano Gaibor García (25 January 1952 – 4 June 2021) was an Ecuadorian Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of Roman Catholic Diocese of Tulcán between 2011 until his death in 2021.Falleció Fausto Gaibor, obispo de Tulcán Gaibor García was born in Guaranda, Ecuador. Gaibor García died in Tulcán, Ecuador on 4 June 2021, aged 69. ==References== Category:Ecuadorian Roman Catholic bishops Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Fausto Gaibor García
